name: Friendsim NewGame+
description:
A fanmade expansion to Hiveswap Friendsim that focuses on just hanging out with all the new friends you made in the base game!

The current version only has one route- Fly kites with Galekh and Vikare! Examine the roots of Vikare's flight obsession! Bond over a mutual love of tiny horses!

But future routes are already in the works, where you'll be able to go to court with Tyzias and Tagora, watch anime with Azdaja and Tegiri, or celebrate midwinter with Amisia, Wanshi, and Karako!

Why make all these friends if you aren't going to spend time with them? Enter new game + and develop your established friendships like never before!
